text: 3. More generally, suppose that the recursive part of a recurrence for some runtime 7'(n) has the form: T(n) = aT(n/b) + cn* for n > ng, where a > 0,b > 1,¢ > 0,k > 0 are constants. ‘What is the total work done at level 2 of the recurrence tree? ‘What is the total work done at level i? ‘Write a sum for the total runtime. Note that the tree has logy, n levels.
